description: Bottom third of the Horizontal Triptych layout. The smoke clears slightly to reveal Russian troops struck by the volleys — men stumble, banners dip, formations waver. Through the haze, Döbeln’s silhouette remains steady on horseback, the embodiment of resolve.
narration: In the chaos, order — the Swedish line holds firm.
info: Page 8 – Counterfire Ordered. PageType: 3. Scene (panel 3): aftermath of the volley, Russians falter as Döbeln oversees the line.
